class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut = sorted(horizontalCut, reverse=True)
        verticalCut = sorted(verticalCut, reverse=True)

        totalCost = 0
        horizontalPieces = 1
        verticalPieces = 1

        i, j = 0, 0
        while i < len(horizontalCut) and j < len(verticalCut):
            if horizontalCut[i] >= verticalCut[j]:
                totalCost += horizontalCut[i] * verticalPieces
                horizontalPieces += 1
                i += 1
            else:
                totalCost += verticalCut[j] * horizontalPieces
                verticalPieces += 1
                j += 1

        while i < len(horizontalCut):
            totalCost += horizontalCut[i] * verticalPieces
            horizontalPieces += 1
            i += 1

        while j < len(verticalCut):
            totalCost += verticalCut[j] * horizontalPieces
            verticalPieces += 1
            j += 1

        return totalCost
